translations: n．侄女、外甥女（niece的复数形式）：指兄弟姐妹的女儿。
· My nieces are coming to visit me this weekend.
我的侄女们这个周末要来看我。

sentences.sentence: Wagner wrote a will that would do this: to each of his four brothers, he left one of his legs or arms, his nephew got his nose and his two nieces each got an ear.
sentences.translation: 瓦格纳写了这样一份遗嘱：给他的四个兄弟每人留下他的一条腿或一条胳膊，他的侄子得到了他的鼻子，他的两个侄女每人得到了一只耳朵。

sentences.sentence: She has two nieces of her own.
If you don't have kids of your own think of your nieces and nephews.
sentences.translation: 如果你还没有自己的孩子，想象一下你的侄女或侄子。
